footnotes: T'a Sin Mim, harufi za kutamkwa kubainisha kuwa Qur'ani hii ni muujiza wa harufi hizi hizi za mazungumzo yenu, na ili kuwazindua wenye kusikia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
